input_text:
Job Title: Catalog Data Analyst - Heavy Duty

Location: Gastonia, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Research, Supply Chain

Description:
Catalog Data Analyst – Heavy-DutyLocation: Gastonia, NC
MANN+HUMMEL, a pioneering leader in the heavy-duty vehicle industry, is seeking a dynamic Catalog Data Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in maintaining our competitive edge by ensuring the accuracy and completeness of our product information. As the primary liaison between our organization and the heavy-duty vehicle market, you will spearhead research efforts, foster dealer relationships, and drive strategic initiatives to enhance our offerings.Key Responsibilities:Conduct comprehensive research on the Heavy-Duty vehicle market, encompassing On-Highway Trucks and Off-Highway Equipment such as Agriculture, Construction, and Forestry machinery.Cultivate and nurture relationships with local dealers to obtain crucial Original Equipment (OE) part numbers, model numbers, and part footnotes.Continuously monitor major market competitors to ensure alignment of our product offerings and maintain parity.Facilitate the Sample Ordering process for new OE filters, ensuring seamless integration into our product line.Serve as the primary point of contact for all Heavy-Duty related field requests and inquiries, providing expert guidance and support.Uphold data integrity within our Product Information Management (PIM) system by meticulously adding new records and maintaining existing ones.Develop into a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the Heavy-Duty segment, providing insights and recommendations to drive business growth.Collaborate with the team on various research projects as needed to support organizational objectives.Your ProfileRequirements: (NOT ACCEPTING CANDIDATES WITH VISA)Education:Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field, or equivalent experience in the Heavy-Duty vehicle or parts industry.Experience:Minimum of 2 years of experience in conducting web-based research, and/or 2+ years in the Heavy-Duty vehicle or parts industry.Proficiency in Microsoft Excel with intermediate-level skills.Strong research capabilities and resourcefulness, with a demonstrated ability to leverage internet search engines effectively.Detail-oriented mindset coupled with a proactive, self-starting attitude.Preferred Skills:Familiarity with the Automotive, Construction Equipment, Farm Equipment, or Trucking industries.Knowledge of parts schematics and drawings, enhancing the ability to interpret and analyze technical data.We offerBenefits:Competitive salary commensurate with experience.Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off.Opportunities for career advancement and professional growth within a global organization.A dynamic and inclusive work environment that fosters creativity, collaboration, and innovation. Join Mann+Hummel and be part of a team that is shaping the future of filtration technology. Apply now to embark on a rewarding career in manufacturing engineering!

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Catalog Data Analyst - Heavy Duty
output_json.summary: MANN+HUMMEL seeks a Catalog Data Analyst to join their team in Gastonia, NC.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field
job_responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive research on the Heavy-Duty vehicle market
Cultivate and nurture relationships with local dealers
Serve as the primary point of contact for all Heavy-Duty related field requests
Uphold data integrity within PIM system
Develop into an SME for the Heavy-Duty segment
output_json.company_information: MANN+HUMMEL is a pioneering leader in the heavy-duty vehicle industry.
